dailyFortune.title: Daily Fortune
dailyFortune.subtitle: Your daily dose of inspiration and cosmic wisdom

overview.title: About Daily Fortune
overview.description: Daily Fortune is a delightful mobile application that brings a touch of cosmic magic to your routine. Each day, receive a personalized fortune to brighten your day.
overview.motivation: Whether you're looking for a morning boost, a phrase to keep you on track, or a message to share, Daily Fortune fits into your routine to spread positivity and clarity.

items.daily: New cosmic fortunes delivered every day
items.motivation: A chosen message to brighten your day: fortune cookie, motivational quote, or positive affirmation
items.modern: Clean, responsive interface with smooth animations
items.cosmic: Space-inspired design that captures the wonder of the universe

technology.title: Technology Stack
technology.description: Built with modern web technologies to deliver a fast, beautiful, and reliable experience:

stack.nextjs: Next.js - React framework for production-ready applications
stack.tailwind: Tailwind CSS - Utility-first styling for cosmic aesthetics
stack.native: React Native - Native mobile experience for iOS and Android

ai.title: Powered by Intelligence
ai.description: Daily Fortune leverages modern AI capabilities to generate unique, engaging, and contextually relevant fortunes that resonate with everyone's daily experiences and aspirations.

cta.title: Explore Daily Fortune
cta.description: Discover your cosmic fortune and let the stars guide your journey.
